data.description: User interface classes for gPIKT, a PIKT GUI
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
PIKT (http://pikt.org) is a widely used systems management
    application, that has been ported to wide variety of unix systems.
    This last year, several PIKT modules have been written that covers
    many aspects. PIKT::UI is one of them, and as it names suggests, it
    implements a User Interface. Among others, PIKT::Config is an
    interface to pikt configuration system, PIKT::Random contains and
    interface to several PRNGs used in pikt. As pikt will integrate
    direct perl support in its future versions, other modules will come
    as well (PIKT::History for instance). This is why a rootlevel
    namespace seems reasonable in this perspective.
